Coordinate

Toolbar / Icon:
   
Menu: Snap - Coordinate
Shortcut: S, X
Commands: snapcoordinate | sx

Description:

Defines a point by entering an absolute or relative Cartesian coordinate.

Procedure:

  1. Start this tool when you have to specify a point and want to do so by entering a coordinate.
  2. Enter the coordinate in the options tool bar and choose if it is an absolute coordinate or a relative one (relative to the relative zero point).
  3. Click the OK button or press Enter to confirm the input and set the coordinate:
